nodes.bodyText: Since it's likely SpanContext won't actually be renamed, getContext() desparately needs to be renamed to getSpanContext().

Question from the SIG meeting today: would it make sense to have a method on ImplicitContextKeyed for retrieving the item from the Context as well? Seems like having both saving and retrieval would be a win.
It came to mind, but these need to be static so can't :)
hmmm. Yeah, no static methods on an interface. This is what happens when I try to reason about things the morning after the 10pm meeting the night before. ;)
